snippet.title: Wii - Rhythm Heaven Fever Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Our final Rhythm Heaven Fever hint is hidden somewhere in this video. Combine all four to uncover the special message.  

Official Site: http://rhythmheavenfever.nintendo.com 
Like Wii on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Wii
